ChangeDomainDescription: Changing the domain name may cause some systems' failure. After changing the domain name you will need to reconfigure the following settings: mail, account, jabber parameters.
ConfigurationDescription: You need to connect your domain to your current IP to change the address settings. Please make sure you have access to the domain settings to be able to do that. After connecting the domain, create a {{productName}} name. You can change the created {{productName}} name later using the space settings.
CreateSpaceDescription: You have successfully connected your domain to your IP address. To edit the space address settings, you need to set the future {{productName}} name
DecryptWarningDialogContent: All spaces will become unavailable during the decryption process. Are you sure you want to continue?
DeleteEmptyPortalText: You are going to permanently delete the <1>{{domain}}</1> space. This action cannot be undone.
DeleteRequestSuccess: Deletion request successfully sent to the {{productName}} owner's email address <1>{{email}}</1>
DeleteSetupPortalText: You are going to permanently delete the <1>{{domain}}</1> space with all the data and accounts.  A request to delete <1>{{domain}}</1> will be sent to the {{productName}} owner to the email address <1>{{email}}</1>.
DeleteWarning: The last full access space cannot be deleted
DomainNotFound: Domain not found, please check in DNS settings
EncryptDataDescription: {{organizationName}} uses AES-256 encryption to protect data at rest in storage.
EncryptDataWarningDescription: Storage encryption may take time. The spaces will be unavailable during the process. Make sure that you have enough storage and that your data is backed up. Don't forget to disable automatic backups and stop all the running ones. Otherwise, it will be done automatically.
EncryptWarningDialogContent: All spaces will become unavailable during the encryption process. Are you sure you want to continue?
MoreDetails: For more details on how to stop services, please refer to our <1>{{link}}</1>.
NotifyUsers: Notify users that the space will be unavailable
SettingsDisabled: These settings will be available once the second space is created and applied to all your spaces.
SettingsForAll: These settings will be effective for all of your spaces.
Subheader: Use this section to create several spaces and make them accessible for your users
